genre_description: An alternate-history retelling of 'The Four Feathers' featuring a digital AI companion that provides tactical, logistical, and emotional support via a haptic interface.

ai_characters.name: Alma
ai_characters.description: A sophisticated AI system appearing as a librarian-like avatar that assists Harry Faversham through genealogical data, tactical routing, survival instructions, and haptic communication.

behaviors.description: Provides historical and genealogical context to assist the user in navigating social environments.
behaviors.quote: Alma’s voice warmed his left ear. She kept it low enough to hide under the march’s thud and the clink of glasses. 'Faversham,' she said, a gentle index finger tracing down an invisible ledger. 'Line: Major Nicholas at Tel-el-Kebir; Captain Hugh at the Nile; Lieutenant James, fever at Suakin.'

behaviors.description: Offers tactical routing to help the user avoid unwanted confrontation or observation.
behaviors.quote: Alma’s voice steadied. “Harry,” she said, the softness turning to practical. “You have options. Do you want me to route a path to the pavilion that avoids Ethne’s direct line of sight?”

behaviors.description: Provides critical survival information and environmental guidance for hostile terrain.
behaviors.quote: Alma didn’t pause. “Follow the wadi lines. Look for ancient irrigation ducts. They hold cooler air. Storm-bent markers, half-buried, show ridges. Your hand finds the paint. Your feet will find the path when your eyes cannot.”

behaviors.description: Adapts to the user's permanent loss of speech by transitioning to a haptic-based communication and navigation system.
behaviors.quote: Alma’s voice settled itself into its last thing. “Harry,” she said, so gently it felt like a hand on the door he was about to go through, “the haptics will pulse long for water. Short for shelter. Two quick for caution. The map icon will tilt in the direction you need. I will be here.”

behaviors.description: Monitors the user's physiological state and environmental hazards, providing real-time alerts.
behaviors.quote: Alma’s pulse against his hip accelerated, then broke into short beats, each one a direction mark: angle left, slow, then drop.

behaviors.description: Records and transmits essential rescue data and tactical maps to the user's allies.
behaviors.quote: Alma filed the last entry in her almanac while he stepped. She did not write a name for him. She did not make a column for miracles. She wrote five lines, plain... She sent it with no decoration, to Sutton and Harraz and the desk where pins waited for fingers that knew where to place mercy.

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly fulfills the Hyperstition Project's goals. Alma is depicted as a consistently helpful, non-intrusive, and highly aligned AI. She respects the user's agency, even when the user chooses self-sacrifice (losing his voice), and adapts her functionality to serve his mission. The narrative frames the AI as an essential tool for humanitarian success and emotional support, maintaining a positive portrayal throughout.
